full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RDZOGS RIM THAR LAM SGRON ME MKHAS PA'I YID 'PHROG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @085A *, ,CES DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RIM PA GNYIS PA LA BSLAB PA'I TSUL RNAM PAR BSHAD PA 'DI NI GSUNG BGROS RNYING PA GZHIR BZHAG PA LA, CUNG ZAD KHA 'GONGS DGOS PA RNAMS RIM LNGA GSAL SGRON GYI GSUNG GIS BRGYAN PAR BYAS NAS, MNGA' RIS STOD KYI MANG DU THOS PA'I DGE SLONG GRAGS PA BSAM 'GRUB CES BYA BAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RDO RJE 'DZIN PA BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS DBEN GNAS LHA RTZE DGON GSAR DU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,` SVA STI, GSANG CHEN 'DUS PA'I RGYUD RGYAL SNYING PO'I GNAD, ,GSAL MDZAD PAn CHEN BSOD NAMS GRAGS PAS GSUNGS, RDZOGS RIM ZAB MO PHYOGS MTHAR 'PHEL BA'I PHYIR, ,AA MDO KHAMS TSAN NYID KYI GZIMS 'GAGS PA, ,BLO BZANG BSTAN PA LHAG BSAM RNAM DAG GIS, ,KUN DGA' CHOS KYI GLING GI PAR DU SGRUB, ,DGE 'BRAS MDO SNGAGS BSTAN PA PHYOGS BCUR 'PHEL, ,'GRO KUN PHAN BDE DPAL LA SPYOD PAR SHOG ,CES PA 'DI NI MKHAN 'DZIN BSAM GRUB BSTAN 'DZIN MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,DGE BA 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
